channel.title: Omfg please halp!
channel.description:
Alright so like I noticed whenever I do a godsword special, the animation is really glitchy, like stretchy..
here's a picture
[IMG]http://i46.photobucket.com/albums/f120/Alex_Soccer/Picture5.png[/img]
im sure its client sided, but how can i fix it? some NPC's do it too when attacking, or when they die..

item.title: Omfg please halp!
item.dc:creator: @ZioBotic ZioBotic
item.description:
@ZioBotic wrote:

You Are using the wrong client, this has happened to me or it is the animation’s and stance’s are incorrect - easily changed

Read full topic

item.title: Omfg please halp!
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

Kid did you not believe me?
I wasn’t lying to you.

Read full topic

item.title: Omfg please halp!
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“TremblayX, post:1, topic:410614”]Alright so like I noticed whenever I do a godsword special, the animation is really glitchy, like stretchy…

here’s a picture

im sure its client sided, but how can i fix it? some NPC’s do it too when attacking, or when they die…[/quote]

As Extreme said in your post here, the animation id is wrong. The animations are set server-side. So either you are sending the wrong animations, or in adding some new animations, you wrote over the data from the existing animation.

Read full topic
